info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 4:03PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT... WEATHER... * Pockets of freezing rain continue to push through the Tri- Cities region, especially interior portions of Midland and Bay counties, as temperatures hover around the freezing mark for the next few hours. * Light ice accumulations are possible on untreated area roadways and surfaces during the evening commute. * Precipitation coverage and intensity tapers off by 7 PM, although pockets of freezing drizzle may linger through the evening. IMPACTS... * Drivers and pedestrians should be prepared for variable conditions throughout the evening commute. && PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... * Motorists are urged to use caution and account for hazardous driving conditions by slowing down and allowing extra time. * Prepare, plan and stay informed. Visit http://go.usa.gov/c7kkP
